title: 435-B
statement: B. Pasha Maximizestime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutPasha has a positive integerawithout leading zeroes. Today he decided that the number is too small and he should make it larger. Unfortunately, the only operation Pasha can do is to swap two adjacent decimal digits of the integer.Help Pasha count the maximum number he can get if he has the time to make at mostkswaps.InputThe single line contains two integersaandk(1 ≤a≤ 1018; 0 ≤k≤ 100).OutputPrint the maximum number that Pasha can get if he makes at mostkswaps.ExamplesInput1990 1Output9190Input300 0Output300Input1034 2Output3104Input9090000078001234 6Output9907000008001234
